about_the_game:
Disclaimer


All characters portrayed in this game are over 21 years of age.

DLC Contents



This DLC adds 18+ content to the base game of Sable's Grimoire: Man And Elf.
This content includes an uncensored sex scene with 2 new CGs towards the end of the game, and 2 new entries on the Gallery page.

This is bundled separately so that the main game will remain suitable for players under 18.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 5 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.4
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 5 MB available space

name: Sable's Grimoire: Man And Elf 18+ Patch
